name: Chaos runner (jellybeans)
description:
This game was made for the GMTKGJ 2020 with the theme "Out of control".

The game is an endless runner with random events, so the game is going out of control.  The goal of this game is to get the highest score, dodging the obstacles and surviving. All code/art/sound was made during the game jam and no assets were used. This game uses a WASD control scheme.
